string.value: You brought Ryden fresh Octopus Legs that will be used to make Lady Syl's tonic. Wonder how it's coming along? Go talk to #bRyden#k.

So, it appears that herbs are required to complete the tonic. Use the portal at the right side of Kerning City and hunt #rDark Stumps#k that are on the way to Perion. Gather the #bLeaves#k they drop and bring them to Ryden.
You can only hope that the tonic will make Lady Syl feel better...

string.value: EXP 3,800\r\nCan proceed to 'Fifth Mission: Fabrication' quest.\r\n
#h0#, I'm glad you're here. \r\n#L0##bIs something wrong?#l\n#k
I just realized that the most important ingredients in a tonic are herbs. Can you bring me some herbs while I keep my eyes on the tonic?

If you enter the portal at the right end of Kerning City and pass through the Sunset Sky towards Perion, you'll come across Dark Stumps. Hunt the #rDark Stumps#k and bring back #b20 Leaves#k. You'll have to return before I finish boiling the tonic.
But the tonic can't be completed without the herbs...
Oh! You've returned. I was fanning the fire for the tonic because it was almost out. Please hand me some firewood.
Aah, this should do it. Now, I need to bring it to Lady Syl. I will have a new mission for you soon so come see me again.
